dietFeatures.title: Diet Features
dietFeatures.description: Nutritional information specific to the dietary plan. May include dietary recommendations on what foods to avoid, what foods to consume, and specific alterations/deviations from the USDA or other regulatory body's approved dietary guidelines.

endorsers.title: Endorsers
endorsers.description: People or organizations that endorse the plan.

expertConsiderations.title: Expert Considerations
expertConsiderations.description: Medical expert advice related to the plan.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Descriptive information establishing the overarching theory/philosophy of the plan. May include the rationale for the name, the population where the plan first came to prominence, etc.

physiologicalBenefits.title: Physiological Benefits
physiologicalBenefits.description: Specific physiologic benefits associated to the plan.

proprietaryName.title: Proprietary Name
proprietaryName.description: Proprietary name given to the diet plan, typically by its originator or creator.

risks.title: Risks
risks.description: Specific physiologic risks associated to the plan.
